properties.areaDesc: Wayne, IL; White, IL; Gallatin, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 8:55AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...
Little Wabash River at Carmi affecting Gallatin...Wayne and White
Counties

.The Little Wabash River will continue to rise through next week,
cresting at Carmi on Friday.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Little Wabash River at Carmi
* until further notice.
* At  8:30 AM Saturday the stage was 33.7 feet.
* Flood Stage is 27.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 34.6 feet by
Friday early afternoon then begin falling.
* Impact...At 35.5 Feet...Businesses are affected just downstream of
IL Route 14 and Route 1 in Carmi flood.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
